data: The note Mobile App Gamification Features outlines a proposal to introduce badges and leaderboards to boost user engagement.
The note Mobile App Gamification Features specifies that users earn points for activity and can redeem points for perks in the rewards system.
The note Mobile App Gamification Features requires integration with the existing user profile API and mandates real-time updates under technical requirements.
The note Mobile App Gamification Features highlights key features including a badge system, leaderboard integration, and points rewards.
The note Mobile App Gamification Features identifies action items such as defining point thresholds and designing badge icons.
The note Mobile App Gamification Features reflects a business decision by SocialApp Co. to enhance the mobile app through gamification features.
